oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Francis Marion
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Francis Marion in uniform with sword in hand, on horseback, riding through the swamps with his men behind him. The horse is jumping over a log. The men in background appear to have torches.
Brigadier General, American Revolution; nicknamed "Swamp Fox" by the British for his elusiveness.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Marion, Francis, 1732-1795
Horses, War horses; Torches; Torches in art; Horses in art; Clothing and dress
Generals; Horses; Uniforms; Military officers; Military personnel; Military uniforms
